body:
SELECT TSM.MakinaID, TSP.* FROM  IT08_TSeriParca TSP
INNER JOIN IT08_TSeriM TSM On TSM.TSeriID = TSP.TSeriID
Where TSM.MakinaID = 1200

Select Distinct PRM.RotaID,IET.CikanMlzAmbarID,A.AmbarAdi,,PCM.AmbarID,PRM.AddDate FROM  IT05_PartiRotaM PRM
INNER JOIN IT05_PlanCikanM PCM On PCM.IsEmriNo = PRM.IsEmriNo
INNER JOIN IT06_Stoklar S On S.UrunTID = PCM.UrunTID
INNER JOIN IT01_IsEmriTipleri IET On IET.IsEmriTipID = PRM.IsEmriTipID
INNER JOIN IT01_Ambarlar A On A.AmbarID = IET.CikanMlzAmbarID
Where S.StokTipID = 3 And PRM.RotaID = 7 And PRM.Durumu  =1

Select GCM.ProsesID, SA.SeriID,Sa.* FROM  IT06_StokAmbar SA
INNER JOIN IT05_PartiRotaM PRM On PRM.IsEmriNo = SA.IsEmriNo
INNER JOIN IT07_GerCikanMalzeme GCM On GCM.SeriID = SA.SeriID   And GCM.ProsesID = 3
INNER JOIN IT07_GerIsNo GI On GI.IsNo = GCM.IsNo
INNER JOIN IT05_PartiRotaD PRD On PRD.IsEmriNo = PRM.IsEmriNo And PRD.Durumu  =1
 Where Sa.AmbarID  =52 And  PRM.Durumu  =1 Order By SA.AddDate asc

SELECT * FROM  IT01_Ambarlar A Where A.AmbarID 
IN
(
52,
55,
486,
NULL,
52
)


Select RD.RotaID, RD.SiraNo, P.ProsesAdi,P.GirenAmbarID,Rd.* FROM  IT05_RotaD RD 
INNER JOIN  IT01_Prosesler P On P.ProsesID = RD.ProsesID
Where RD.RotaID
IN
(
301,
7,
429
)
